mangle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to damage or injure something badly by crushing or twisting it
mangle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The trap closed round her leg, badly mangling her ankle.
mangle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to spoil something such as a speech or piece of music, by saying or playing it badly
mangle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The orchestra had mangled Bachâ€™s music.
mangle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a machine used in former times to remove water from washed clothes by pressing them between two rollers
